DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to evaluate the effects of IBU 5% Topical Gel versus topical placebo for the relief of pain associated with a first or second degree ankle sprain. Both twice daily and three times daily regimens will be evaluated.
DOC.criteria: First or second degree ankle sprain within 48 hours of first dose of study medication Medically cleared to participate Similar injury of same joint within last 6 months Requires bed rest, surgery, or overthecounter or prescription analgesics
